introduction.title: The City of the Elite
introduction.text: You are a member of the elite in a city of unimaginable wealth and power. But you are a prisoner in a gilded cage. You must find a way to escape your life of luxury and find true freedom.

seek_a_way_out.title: The Underground
seek_a_way_out.text: You discover a hidden world beneath the city, a world of poverty and rebellion. You have a chance to join the fight for freedom, but it will not be easy.

accept_your_fate.title: A Life of Empty Luxury
accept_your_fate.text: You resign yourself to a life of comfort and ease. You have everything you could ever want, but you are not happy.

join_the_rebellion.title: A Dangerous New Life
join_the_rebellion.text: You join the rebellion and fight for a better world. You have found your purpose, but you have also made powerful enemies.
